DOC.brief_summary: An Investigation Return Play Exertion Protocol Concussed Adolescents
DOC.brief_title: An Investigation Return Play Exertion Protocol Concussed Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: Written inform parental consent assent obtain subject . The PI Co-I administer ImPACT ( Immediate Post-Concussion Assessment Cognitive Testing ) , PCSS ( Post Concussion Symptom Scale ) , VOMS ( Vestibular Ocular Motor Screening ) subject first clinical visit . In addition demographic variable age gender , group match base ImPACT VOMS performance well number , type , severity symptom report PCSS . Subjects assign receive either currently accept standard care ( Heart Rate Exertion group ) newly develop exertion protocol ( Dynamic Exertion Group ) . Participants match accord PCSS total , VOMS symptom report , demographic variable include age gender . The first participant assign dynamic exertion group next standard care group , alternate accordingly covariates allow . The physical therapist responsible administer assigned exertion protocol subject across four time point ( one week session ) . Follow-up data regard recovery time ( i.e. , clinical return normal activity ) also collect . Neurocognitive test take place 3-4 week interval consistent clinical practice . The current study include pre-exertion neurocognitive evaluation post-exertion protocol neurocognitive evaluation .
DOC.criteria: 1417 year age Referred exertion physical therapy within 6 week sport related concussion Family history mood anxiety disorder Diagnosis treatment migraine Diagnosed history learning disability , ADHD ( Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ) Concussion history 3 Other factor would prevent subject complete exertion protocol
